languages.text: {n}Взгляд Ардженты устремлен вверх — на парящее в воздухе судно друкари и извивающиеся тела, прибитые к борту.{/n} "Это... это сержант Вигастис! Я узнаю его, узнаю его голос! {name}, помоги мне! Мы должны спасти этих людей от издевательств ксеносов!"

{n}You follow Argenta's gaze to the soaring Drukhari craft and the squirming bodies nailed to its side.{/n} "That's... That's Sergeant Vigastes! I recognise him, I know his voice! {name}, help me! We have to save these people from this torture!"
languages.original_text: {n}Взгляд Ардженты устремлен вверх — на парящее в воздухе судно друкари и извивающиеся тела, прибитые к борту.{/n} "Это... это сержант Вигастис! Я узнаю его, узнаю его голос! {name}, помоги мне! Мы должны спасти этих людей от издевательств ксеносов!"

traits.locale_text: {n}You follow Argenta's gaze to the soaring Drukhari craft and the squirming bodies nailed to its side.{/n} "That's... That's Sergeant Vigastes! I recognise him, I know his voice! {name}, help me! We have to save these people from this torture!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}You follow Argenta's gaze to the soaring Drukhari craft and the squirming bodies nailed to its side.{/n} "That's... That's Sergeant Vigastes! I recognise him, I know his voice! {name}, help me! We have to save these people, these victims of deceit and treachery!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}You follow Argenta's gaze to the soaring Drukhari craft and the squirming bodies nailed to its side.{/n} "That's... That's Sergeant Vigastes! I recognise him, I know his voice! {name}, help me! We have to save these people from this torture!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}You follow Argenta's gaze to the soaring Drukhari craft and the squirming bodies nailed to its side.{/n} "That's... That's Sergeant Vigastes! I recognise him, I know his voice! {name}, help me! We have to save these people from this torture!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}You follow Argenta's gaze to the soaring Drukhari craft and the squirming bodies nailed to its side.{/n} "That's... That's Sergeant Vigastes! I recognise him, I know his voice! {name}, help me! We have to save these people from this torture!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Vous suivez le regard d'Argenta, fixé sur le vaisseau drukhari et les corps agonisants cloués sur ses flancs.{/n} « C'est... c'est le sergent Vigastes ! C'est lui, je reconnais sa voix ! {name}, aidez-moi ! Nous devons libérer ces gens ! »
languages.original_text: {n}You follow Argenta's gaze to the soaring Drukhari craft and the squirming bodies nailed to its side.{/n} "That's... That's Sergeant Vigastes! I recognise him, I know his voice! {name}, help me! We have to save these people from this torture!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous suivez le regard d'Argenta, fixé sur le vaisseau drukhari et les corps agonisants cloués sur ses flancs.{/n} « C'est... c'est le sergent Vigastes ! C'est lui, je reconnais sa voix ! {name}, aidez-moi ! Nous devons libérer ces gens ! »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}你跟着阿洁塔的目光，看到了天上的黑暗灵族战机。战机侧面钉着几个人，不住地扭动着。{/n}“那个人是……维加斯特军士！我认得他，我听到了他的声音！快帮帮我，{name}！咱们必须把那些人从这场折磨中解救出来！”
languages.original_text: {n}You follow Argenta's gaze to the soaring Drukhari craft and the squirming bodies nailed to its side.{/n} "That's... That's Sergeant Vigastes! I recognise him, I know his voice! {name}, help me! We have to save these people from this torture!"

traits.locale_text: {n}你跟着阿洁塔的目光，看到了天上的黑暗灵族战机。战机侧面钉着几个人，不住地扭动着。{/n}“那个人是……维加斯特军士！我认得他，我听到了他的声音！快帮帮我，{name}！咱们必须把那些人从这场折磨中解救出来！”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}あなたがアルジェンタの視線を追った先には、空にそびえるデュカーリの宇宙船と、その船体に張り付けにされ身もだえする人々の姿があった。{/n}「あれは…ヴィガステス軍曹だ！彼の声には聞き覚えがある！{name}手を貸してくれ！あの人たちを拷問から助け出さないと！」
languages.original_text: {n}You follow Argenta's gaze to the soaring Drukhari craft and the squirming bodies nailed to its side.{/n} "That's... That's Sergeant Vigastes! I recognise him, I know his voice! {name}, help me! We have to save these people from this torture!"

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたがアルジェンタの視線を追った先には、空にそびえるデュカーリの宇宙船と、その船体に張り付けにされ身もだえする人々の姿があった。{/n}「あれは…ヴィガステス軍曹だ！彼の声には聞き覚えがある！{name}手を貸してくれ！あの人たちを拷問から助け出さないと！」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Du folgst Argentas Blick in Richtung des gewaltigen Drukhari-Schiffs und den zappelnden Körpern, die an dessen Seite festgenagelt sind.{/n} "Das ist ... Das ist Unteroffizier Vigastes! Ich erkenne ihn, ich kenne seine Stimme! {name}, helft mir! Wir müssen dafür sorgen, dass ihnen diese Folter erspart bleibt!"
languages.original_text: {n}You follow Argenta's gaze to the soaring Drukhari craft and the squirming bodies nailed to its side.{/n} "That's... That's Sergeant Vigastes! I recognise him, I know his voice! {name}, help me! We have to save these people from this torture!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Du folgst Argentas Blick in Richtung des gewaltigen Drukhari-Schiffs und den zappelnden Körpern, die an dessen Seite festgenagelt sind.{/n} "Das ist ... Das ist Unteroffizier Vigastes! Ich erkenne ihn, ich kenne seine Stimme! {name}, helft mir! Wir müssen dafür sorgen, dass ihnen diese Folter erspart bleibt!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Sigues la mirada de Argenta hasta la aeronave Drukhari y los cuerpos convulsos que lleva clavados en un costado.{/n} «¡Ese... ese es el sargento Vigastes! ¡Es él, reconozco su voz! ¡{name}, ayúdeme! ¡Tenemos que salvar a esa gente de su tortura!».
languages.original_text: {n}You follow Argenta's gaze to the soaring Drukhari craft and the squirming bodies nailed to its side.{/n} "That's... That's Sergeant Vigastes! I recognise him, I know his voice! {name}, help me! We have to save these people from this torture!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Sigues la mirada de Argenta hasta la aeronave Drukhari y los cuerpos convulsos que lleva clavados en un costado.{/n} «¡Ese... ese es el sargento Vigastes! ¡Es él, reconozco su voz! ¡{name}, ayúdeme! ¡Tenemos que salvar a esa gente de su tortura!».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta'nın bakışlarını takip ediyorsun. Kükreyen Drukhari gemisine ve yanlarına çivilenmiş, kıvranan vücutlara bakıyor.{/n} "Bu... Çavuş Vigastes bu! Onu tanıyorum, sesini tanıyorum! {name}, bana yardım et! Zavallı insanları bu işkenceden kurtarmalıyız!"
languages.original_text: {n}You follow Argenta's gaze to the soaring Drukhari craft and the squirming bodies nailed to its side.{/n} "That's... That's Sergeant Vigastes! I recognise him, I know his voice! {name}, help me! We have to save these people from this torture!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta'nın bakışlarını takip ediyorsun. Kükreyen Drukhari gemisine ve yanlarına çivilenmiş, kıvranan vücutlara bakıyor.{/n} "O… Çavuş Vigastes bu! Onu tanıyorum, sesini tanıyorumm! {name}, bana yardım et! Zavallı insanları, bu işkenceden kurtarmalıyız!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
